SEARCH
Package source.Entity

Class Student

java.lang.Object
source.Entity.User
source.Entity.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Student extends User
The Student class holds all information about its registered camps, its enquiries and all other information such as points.
Since:
11/23/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

      password - the password of the student
      facultyInfo - the faculty of the student
      accumulatedPoints - the points of the student
